channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Adyen shares slide as payments giant's transaction volume growth slows
item.description: Adyen shares sank Thursday after the company reported a slowdown in the growth of its transaction volumes in the third quarter.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Tread Water Ahead of Storage Data
item.description: Gas futures were little changed ahead of the EIA’s weekly storage report, which is expected to show a larger-than-average injection.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise After Wednesday's Selloff
item.description: Gold futures rose 0.5%, rebounding from Wednesday’s selloff, when it dropped as low as $2,660.70 an ounce. The slump from late October highs reflects ...

item.title: Super Micro shares plummet 18% after financial update heightens investor concerns
item.description: Super Micro's stock fell to its lowest since mid-2023 on Wednesday after the company issued unaudited quarterly results that added to investor concern...

item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq Rise Ahead of Interest-Rate Decision
item.description: Stocks are modestly higher ahead of the Federal Reserve’s expected interest-rate decision of a quarter-percentage point cut.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery adds 7.2 million Max subscribers, the streamer's largest single-quarter jump
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery said its streaming platform Max added 7.2 million subscribers during the third quarter.

item.title: Moderna posts surprise profit as Covid vaccine sales impress, cost cuts take hold
item.description: Moderna said its newest Covid vaccine saw benefits after winning approval in the U.S. three weeks earlier than the last iteration of the shot did in 2...

item.title: E.l.f. shares soar as cosmetics retailer raises guidance after posting 40% sales gain
item.description: E.l.f. Beauty raised its full year guidance after posting a 40% jump in sales.

item.title: If the Fed Is Cutting Rates, WhyAren'tMortgage Rates Falling?
item.description: Consumer borrowing costs haven’t tracked the central bank since it cut rates by half a percentage point in September.

item.title: China's Playbook for Trump Tariffs Won't Work This Time
item.description: Even steeper levies would force some hard choices on Beijing.
